Lucky Streak.description: Win five hands in a row without busting or going over 21

Split Personalilty.description: Successfully split a pair of cards and win both hands

Five-Card Charlie.description: Win a hand with a five-card total without busting

Marathon.description: Play 100 consecutive hands without leaving the table

BlackJack Tycoon.description: Accumulate a total chip count of one million in your wallet

Crescendo Conquest.description: Accumulate a total chip count of one million in one sitting
